message: I propose dividing the $10,000 into $7,500 for me and $2,500 for you. This offers a reasonable split considering the first round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 6k for me is a fair start. Your turn!
Considering the inflation and previous offers, I propose we both receive $5,000 each. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the diminishing value of money with each round.
